Plot: Princess Fiona's parents invite her and Shrek to dinner to celebrate her marriage. If only they knew the newlyweds were both ogres.
Title: Shrek 2
Writer: William Steig (book), Andrew Adamson (story), Andrew Adamson (screenplay), Joe Stillman (screenplay), J. David Stem (screenplay), David N. Weiss (screenplay), Cody Cameron (additional dialogue), Walt Dohrn (additional dialogue), Chris Miller (additional dialogue), David P. Smith (additional dialogue), Conrad Vernon (additional dialogue), Charles Perrault (characters), Jeff Snow (story)
Actors: Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Julie Andrews
tomatoConsensus: It may not be as fresh as the original, but topical humor and colorful secondary characters make Shrek 2 a winner in its own right.
Director: Andrew Adamson, Kelly Asbury, Conrad Vernon
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 48 nominations.
